initBlock.name: INIT_USER_LANG_CODE
initBlock.description: Init Block to populate USER_LANG_CODE.  This init block converts the user's language from the standard used by Answers to the Oracle Fusion standard.  The value is initially set when the user logs in through Answers but can be changed at any time by changing the current preferred language found under 'My Account - Preferences' in Answers.

selectStatements.query:
select CASE
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'ar' THEN 'AR'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'cs' THEN 'CS'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'da' THEN 'DK'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'de' THEN 'D'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'el' THEN 'EL'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'en' THEN 'US'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'es' THEN 'E'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'es-us' THEN 'ESA'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'fi' THEN 'SF'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'fr' THEN 'F'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'fr-ca' THEN 'FRC'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'he' THEN 'IW'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'hr' THEN 'HR'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'hu' THEN 'HU'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'is' THEN 'IS'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'it' THEN 'I'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'ja' THEN 'JA'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'ko' THEN 'KO'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'lt' THEN 'LT'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'nl' THEN 'NL'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'no' THEN 'N'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'pl' THEN 'PL'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'pt' THEN 'PT'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'pt-br' THEN 'PTB'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'ro' THEN 'RO'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'ru' THEN 'RU'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'sk' THEN 'SK'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'sl' THEN 'SL'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'sv' THEN 'S'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'th' THEN 'TH'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'tr' THEN 'TR'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'zh-cn' THEN 'ZHS'
  WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.WEBLANGUAGE)' = 'zh-tw' THEN 'ZHT'
  ELSE 'US'
END
from dual
